column1: na mme ophehile papa le mokopu
eke ntswepelele enyane enyenyane moo feela
litlhare bona dintho ke tsena dingata
ke mang eo ke ausi mang
oo bona mokhotsi keneketlaufa dipompong he
tloo ketlobona hore na uetsa jwang mme
tloo ho mme misstress wan thu
ha ketsebe na ke leng ke leo
tloo kwano mme ketloubotsa hore na ushapile masebina kae
tloo nke phafa ke ena mme
